CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 4, 1960, pg. A12, reads: "Presents Scholarship - Mrs. Ruth Tucker presents the scholarship, given annually by the Norris Music Club, at the concert held at Stephen Foster Hall. Left to right: Martha Morris, Laura Cato, Mrs. Tucker, Mrs. Georgia Norris, director; Lee Grace Jones, winner of the scholarship; Elizabeth Johnson and Cornelius Richardson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Ruth Tucker presenting Norris Music Club scholarship to Lee Grace Jones, with, from left: Martha Morris, Laura Cato, Georgia Norris, Elizabeth Johnson, and Cornelius Richardson, looking on, posed in Stephen Foster Memorial Hall
